title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Establish the project's goals, objectives, and functional requirements for the XR simulation-based training in critical sectors such as aviation and medicine.

title: Design XR Simulation Architecture
description: Develop a comprehensive architecture for the XR simulations that caters to the defined project scope and requirements.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for XR Simulations
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly frontend interface for the XR simulations that allows users to interact with the simulation seamlessly.

title: Develop Backend Services for XR Simulations
description: Create robust backend services that handle the simulation logic, data storage, and real-time interaction between users and simulations.

title: Integrate Database for Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Establish a suitable database architecture to store simulation data, user interactions, and other relevant information.

title: Implement DevOps for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up the necessary DevOps pipelines for continuous integration, testing, and deployment of the XR simulation project.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for XR Simulations
Develop Backend Services for XR Simulations
Integrate Database for Data Storage and Retrieval

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing on XR Simulation Project
description: Test the functionality, usability, and performance of the XR simulation project to ensure it meets the defined project requirements.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for XR Simulations
Develop Backend Services for XR Simulations
Integrate Database for Data Storage and Retrieval

title: Review Project Architecture and Design Decisions
description: Perform a thorough review of the project's architecture, design decisions, and adherence to best practices to ensure efficiency and scalability.

title: Review Frontend Interface Design and Implementation
description: Evaluate the frontend interface design and implementation for usability, accessibility, and adherence to project requirements.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for XR Simulations

title: Review Backend Services Implementation
description: Assess the backend services implementation to ensure functionality, efficiency, and adherence to project requirements.
dependencies: Develop Backend Services for XR Simulations
